title: Testing multiple handicapped children
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health

description: Demonstrates how to evaluate the potential abilities of pre-school children with single and multiple handicaps, by testing three children of varying disabilities and backgrounds: Kevin is unable to move without help, Millie cannot speak and is mentally retarded, and Jimmie has poor hearing and sight, and is suspected of mental retardation
